emails.subject: Re: Logo feedback
emails.body_text: Thanks for the quick turnaround!I love the new color scheme you proposed. The client meeting is scheduled for 3 days before current date, so perfect timing.Just one small tweak - can we try the logo in a slightly bolder font? Other than that, it looks fantastic.Best,Jenny
emails.body_html:
Thanks for the quick turnaround!

I love the new color scheme you proposed. The client meeting is scheduled for 3 days before current date, so perfect timing.

Just one small tweak - can we try the logo in a slightly bolder font? Other than that, it looks fantastic.

Best,
Jenny

emails.subject: Exciting news about the funding round!
emails.body_text:
Hey!
I couldn't wait to share the amazing news - we just closed our Series A funding round! The announcement went public on 21 days before current date.
We raised $15 million led by Andreessen Horowitz, with participation from several other top-tier VCs. This is a huge validation of everything we've been building.
Celebration drinks are on me next Friday! Are you free to join us at that rooftop bar we went to last month?
So excited about what's next!
Nina
emails.body_html:
Hey!

I couldn't wait to share the amazing news - we just closed our Series A funding round! The announcement went public on 21 days before current date.

We raised $15 million led by Andreessen Horowitz, with participation from several other top-tier VCs. This is a huge validation of everything we've been building.

Celebration drinks are on me next Friday! Are you free to join us at that rooftop bar we went to last month?

So excited about what's next!

Nina

emails.subject: Can you review this proposal draft?
emails.body_text:
Hey!
Quick question about the design assets you sent over on 33 days before current date. I'm having trouble opening the Figma file - it might be a permissions issue.
Could you double-check the sharing settings? I need to make some small tweaks before the client review on 29 days before current date.
Thanks!
Carlos
